name: Backpacking Dubai famous spots
description: Winter time is the perfect time to visit Dubai. It is where you can see great people, great environment and also great places. What would be more great if you can visit the famous miracle garden and global village which only opens during the winter season? Come and join me as we explore famous Miracle Garden, Burj Khalifa and Global village in just 1 day. This will be surely an amazing experience of a lifetime :)
